Just a quick note about your render distance, so you can view your builds better.
You can reduce the simulation distance, while increasing your render distance.
That way, you can look a lot further, while not loosing performance. 

The current simulation distance is quite high (23 chunks). In those chunks, entities are calculated, which greatly reduces performance.
